text: satyaniṣēdhikaḷ kūṭṭaṅkūṭṭamāyi narakattīyilēkk nayikkappeṭuṁ. aṅṅane avar atinaṭuttettiyāl atinṟe kavāṭaṅṅaḷ tuṟakkappeṭuṁ. atinṟe kāvalkkār avarēāṭiṅṅane cēādikkuṁ: "niṅṅaḷuṭe nāthanṟe vacanaṅṅaḷ ōtikkēḷppiccu tarikayuṁ ī dinatte kaṇṭumuṭṭēṇṭivarumenn munnaṟiyippu nalkukayuṁ ceyta, niṅṅaḷilninnutanneyuḷḷa daivadūtanmār niṅṅaḷilēkk vannettiyirunnillē?" avar paṟayuṁ: “ate. pakṣē, satyaniṣēdhikaḷkk śikṣāvidhi sthirappeṭṭupēāyi.”
